mapper.select: select * from GATPost left join emd_areas on gat_emd_num = emd_num left join sigg_areas on emd_sigg_num = sigg_num left join sido_areas on sigg_sido_num = sido_num left join post using (po_num) left join member on po_me_num = me_num order by po_num desc

select * from GATPost left join emd_areas on gat_emd_num = emd_num left join sigg_areas on emd_sigg_num = sigg_num left join sido_areas on sigg_sido_num = sido_num left join post using (po_num) left join member on po_me_num = me_num where po_num = #{po_num}
mapper.insert: insert into Post(po_title, po_content, po_me_num) values(#{po_title}, #{po_content}, #{me_num})

insert into GATPost(po_num, gat_gatt_type, gat_startDate, gat_endDate, gat_gat, gat_gats_state, gat_emd_num) values(#{po_num}, #{gatt_type}, #{gat_startDate}, #{gat_endDate}, #{gat_gat}, #{gats_state}, #{emd_num})
mapper.update: update GATPost set gat_gatt_type = #{gatt_type}, gat_startDate = #{gat_startDate}, gat_endDate = #{gat_endDate}, gat_gat = #{gat_gat}, gat_gats_state = #{gats_state}, gat_emd_num = #{emd_num} where po_num = #{po_num}
update Post set po_viewCount = po_viewCount + 1 where po_num = #{po_num}
